salaryExpectations: LKR 150,000 to LKR 800,000+ per month, often for remote international roles.
futureOutlook: While still a niche field in Sri Lanka, the global demand for blockchain developers is high. This is a field with a steep learning curve but offers very high salaries for those who can master it. Most opportunities for Sri Lankan developers are with international companies on a remote basis. The future depends on the broader adoption of Web3 technologies.
